document_title: FortiClientMac - Privilege escalation by abusing a Symlink following vulnerability

note.text: A UNIX symbolic link (Symlink) Following (CWE-61) vulnerability in FortiClient for MacOS may allow a local and unprivileged user to overwrite privileged shell scripts executed during the installation phase via escalating their privileges to root.
note.title: Summary

note.text: FortiClient for MacOS versions 6.4.3 and below.
note.title: Affected Products

note.text: Please upgrade to FortiClient for MacOS version 6.4.4 or above. Please upgrade to FortiClient for MacOS version 7.0.0 or above.
note.title: Solutions

acknowledgment.description: Fortinet is pleased to thank Csaba Fitzl and Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative for bringing this issue to our attention under responsible disclosure.

vulnerability.title: FortiClientMac - Privilege escalation by abusing a Symlink following vulnerability

reference.description: FortiClientMac - Privilege escalation by abusing a Symlink following vulnerability
